ygData.subject: Re: Area effect songs
ygData.msgSnippet: The lullaby does clear the hate list, it clears everyone else in the hate list except the bard who sang it!  For this reason, bards are the best class for
ygData.messageBody:
The lullaby does clear the hate list, it clears everyone else in the hate
list except the bard who sang it! For this reason, bards are the best class
for saving newbies from trains. And yes, it is also very good for twinking.

Lullaby can be very useful if you have a rogue and healer in your group and
fighting multiple mobs. While you sleep the rest of the mobs, the rogue can
backstab the one you are fighting and the cleric can heal you. But I
usually don't use lullaby unless there is a healer in the group and everyone
in the group knows what the ASSIST command is for.

>Yes I know that. What I was wondering was if someone has
>fought a mob past half dead (at which point it would normally
>be almost impossible to pull the mob off him), can you fire up
>the song and mob will now attack the bard or the next person
>to attack him? That's what I was trying to figure out.
>
>Nevertheless, even if this effect exists, hatred for the bard
>seems to be excepted (stuff you put to sleep for a long time
>will attack you until they die even though someone else is
>killing it), which kinda makes it useless except for a
>twinking exploit.
>
>--
>John H. Kim
>kim@...
>
>
